description: Creates text using a Mustache template (https://mustache.github.io/).

input.name: template
input.description: The Mustache template text that contains any number of Mustache variable tags. Variable tags are indicated by the double mustaches that surround them, e.g. `{{ person }}` is a tag.

input.name: variables
input.description: A map of variable names (map keys) with values (map values).
